item.title: Philosophy
item.description: win-win simplicity & minimalism people & connections “better than before I came” Changes and bottlenecks Fitting in Seek for the truth Power, money & fame Why logo? Master Splinter? and other unusual choices Greeting! This is an introduction post. This post tests the followings: Hero image is in the same directory as the post.
